info.name: Event Planner Core API
info.description: Complete API collection for Event Planner Core service (Port 3001). Includes Events, Guests, Invitations, Tickets, Marketplace, and Admin modules.

item.name: Events
item.description: Event management endpoints - CRUD operations and lifecycle management

request.description: Create a new event. Required: title (3-255 chars), event_date (ISO, future), location (max 255). Optional: description (max 5000)

query.description: Filter by status: draft, published, archived

request.description: Get paginated list of events with optional filters
Get detailed information for a specific event
Get statistics for an event (guests, tickets, participation rate)
Update event details. At least one field required. Status can be: draft, published, archived
Change event status from draft to published
Archive an event - makes it inactive but still consultable

item.name: Guests
item.description: Guest management endpoints - CRUD operations and event guest relationships

request.description: Create a new guest. Required: first_name (1-255), email (unique). Optional: last_name (max 255), phone (E.164 format)
Update guest details. Status: pending, confirmed, cancelled
Get guests for a specific event
Add an existing guest to an event. Required: guest_id, invitation_code (6-255 chars)
Bulk add multiple guests to an event
Check-in a specific guest for an event
Get guest statistics for an event
Get all invitations for an event
Get invitation statistics for an event
Get invitation details by code (public access for guests)
Respond to an invitation (public access for guests)

Create a ticket type. Required: name (1-255), type (free|paid|donation), quantity (>= 0). Optional: description (max 5000), price (default 0), currency (3 chars, default EUR), available_from, available_to
Get all ticket types for an event

request.description: Create a ticket template. Required: name (1-255). Optional: description (max 5000), preview_url (URI, max 500), source_files_path (max 500), is_customizable (default false)
Validate if template is suitable for an event
Generate a ticket. Required: event_guest_id, ticket_type_id. Optional: ticket_template_id
Get ticket by its unique code
Get all tickets for an event
Validate a ticket by its ID
Validate a ticket by its code
Get ticket statistics for an event

request.description: Create a marketplace template. Required: name (1-255). Optional: description (max 5000), preview_url (URI, max 500), source_files_path (max 500), price (default 0), currency (3 chars, default EUR)
Create a template review. Required: template_id, rating (1-5). Optional: comment (max 5000)
Purchase a template via payment service
Generate an invoice for a transaction
Check if a template is available for purchase
Create a system log entry. Required: level (info|warning|error), message. Optional: context (object)
Get user details by ID (via Auth Service)
Get events list with admin filters
Moderate content. Required: contentType (template|designer|event), contentId, action (approve|reject|suspend). Optional: reason (max 500)
